description:
With a combined 45 years of experience, our attorneys at the Law Offices of Cavanaugh & Cavanaugh, P.A., in Fort Myers, Florida, have an in-depth understanding of even the most complex family law issues. We use this understanding, combined with the information we glean during the free initial consultation, to devise customized strategies for each individual. While we always work with clients' best interests at the forefront of our minds, we ultimately strive to achieve outcomes that protect familial relationships and put clients in positions to lead happier, more fulfilling lives going forward.

One of our founding partners, attorney Daniel M. Cavanaugh, served as both a former prosecutor and a personal injury and wrongful death attorney. He brings his experience to our law offices to protect clients' freedoms and rights in criminal defense and personal injury matters. Due to his long list of successful results and high ethical standards, attorney Cavanaugh holds the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell. While attorney Shayna K. Cavanaugh handles all divorce, child custody, child support, father's rights, same-sex family law, and domestic violence and neglect cases, Mr. Cavanaugh represents individuals in the following matters:

  • Car accidents
  • Animal bites
  • Products liability
  • Premises liability
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Medical malpractice
  • Brain injury
  • Birth injury
  • Admiralty and maritime
  • Assault and battery - plaintiff
  • Wrongful death
  • DUI/DWI
  • Sex offenses
  • Drug violations
  • White collar crimes

The Law Offices of Cavanaugh & Cavanaugh, P.A. is committed to its clients and works tirelessly to provide nothing short of superior customer service and representation. We pride ourselves on maintaining excellent communication for the duration of a case and, when necessary, offer virtual appointments. We strive to make our services accessible to all who require them, which is why we happily accept credit cards as payment.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
